name: Space Exterminator
description:
Controls:  

Keyboard                                                                                                Gamepad                                                                 

w = Forward
 s = Reverse  
a = strafe left
d = strafe right
left  arrow = Turn Counter-clockwise
right arrow = Turn Clockwise
numpad 0:
  + a = 90 Degree Turn Counter-clockwise
  + d = 90 Degree Turn Clockwise
double-tap = 180 Degree Turn
 space bar = Shoot
(*You can also steer, aim, and shoot using the mouse )
numpad 5 =  Missile
up arrow = Special Command
down arrow = Kill Momentum
Panic Pad:
    numpad 8 =  Kill Momentum + Shift  upwards
    numpad 2 =  Kill Momentum + Shift downwards
    numpad 4 =  Kill Momentum + Shift left
    numpad 6 =  Kill Momentum + Shift Right
numpad 7 =  Zoom -
numpad 9 =  Zoom + ....................................................................................................
escape = Exit Game
Enter = Options
RT/R2 = Forward 
LT/L2 = Reverse  
LB/L1 = strafe left
RB/R1 = strafe right
LeftJoystick:
     Left = Turn Counter-clockwise
    Right = Turn Clockwise
    Click =  Missile
X/Square:
   + LB = 90 Degree Turn Counter-clockwise
  + RB = 90 Degree Turn Clockwise
    double-tap = 180 Degree Turn 
A/Cross = Shoot
Y/Triangle = Special Command
B/Circle = Kill Momentum
Panic Pad (D-Pad):
     Up =  Kill Momentum + Shift  upwards    
    Down =  Kill Momentum + Shift downwards
     Left =  Kill Momentum + Shift left
     Right =  Kill Momentum + Shift Right
Click Right Thumstck = Zoom -/+
Right Thumbstick = Directional Shot
.......................................................................................
Back/Select = Exit Game
Start/Options = Options Menu
